sub_topic: Probability of a certain weather event occurring
message_1: A weather forecast predicts that the probability of rain on a particular day is 0.25. What is the probability that it will not rain on that day?
message_2:
The probability of an event not occurring is equal to 1 minus the probability of the event occurring. In this case, the probability of it not raining on that day is:

1 - 0.25 = 0.75

So, the probability that it will not rain on that day is 0.75 or 75%.
